text: Approval for the use of the c-series lamitrode spinal cord stimulation leads, model numbers 3245 (lamitrode 44c) and 3289 (lamitrode 88c) for use with the ans genesis neurostimlation (ipg) model 3608, the ans genesis xp neurostimulation (ipg) model 3609, the ans genesis dual xp neurostimulation (ipg) model 3644 and the ans genesis g4 neurostimulation (ipg) model 3604 which are indicated as an aid in the management of chronic intractable pain of the trunk and/or limbs, including unilateral or bilateral pain associated with failed back surgery syndrome, intractable low back pain and leg pain.
